131690.title: A Shot In The Dark
131690.description: In a Rio de Janeiro airport, a TAP stewardess kidnaps a two-month-old baby girl. Two years later, the distraught mother is living in Lisbon. In order to survive, she works in a "strip-tease" bar but spends most of her time in the airport hoping to find the stewardess who took her daughter. Then one night she is fired from her job and without money. She joins a gang of ex-security guards from the bar and stays in their hideout. She becomes involved with a series of bank robberies. Soon she is tracked by the police inspector who also seems to have something to hide.

149551.title: Rapt
149551.description: As the unsavory details of a wealthy industrialist's personal life are revealed in the press upon his kidnapping, the urgency to free him disappears.

299638.title: Tilt
299638.description: When his estranged daughter’s world is turned upside-down, Paul must decide what’s more important: doing the right thing, or setting things right.

304372.title: The Crew
304372.description: Several friends on a weekend cruise, rescue two men from a burning boat, causing discord amongst them in this suspense thriller.

312174.title: Desperate Hours
312174.description: In this psychological thriller, an escaped con forces his way into a dysfunctional couple's home and takes over their lives while hiding from the law.

313928.title: Johnny Skidmarks
313928.description: Johnny Skidmark Scardino is a free-lance crime-scene photographer and part-time blackmailer. When his associates begin to turn up murdered, he has a very short time to discover the killer before it is his turn.

327017.title: Chat
327017.description: CHAT is a raw, harrowing look inside a deranged mind. Nothing is as it seems to be. Disturbing characters appear and disappear. Time and characters fold back on themselves. Falcon is photophobic.

382244.title: 8 Days
382244.description: For sixteen-year-old Amber and her mother, sex trafficking was a faraway fear. But after she is kidnapped, Amber must survive eight days in captivity.

405684.title: The Learning Curve
405684.description: THE LEARNING CURVE lets loose a modern-day Bonnie and Clyde in the neon-lit underworld of Los Angeles. Consumed by love and greed, the pair lives fast and free, their wildest dreams come true. But crime and corruption threaten to destroy them, until a fiery confrontation opens a door to redemption.

441878.title: The German Doctor
441878.description: The true story of an Argentine family who lived with Josef Mengele without knowing his true identity, and of a girl who fell in love with one of the biggest criminals of all time.

445016.title: Confess
445016.description: When a disillusioned ex-hacker returns to New York and is humiliated on his job hunt, he and his lover take cyber-revenge upon the establishment.

451362.title: Anabolic Life
451362.description: Anabolic Life is about a young man who desperately struggles with his own body-image. Regardless of his steady job, beautiful fiance, and new home, Adam hates what he sees in the mirror. Battling demons and delusions, his emotional and psychological struggle continues on a downward spiral. He decides that building muscle is his only solution. After researching quick muscle-building tips, Adam stumbles across how to make and use Fina. Next thing you know, he's shooting home-made steroids. Then he develops a needle-related infection and ends up in the hospital. Unfortunately, almost losing his life doesn't end his amateur steroid use. Instead, he encounters a dealer at the gym who takes him under his wing. Adam proceeds down a twisted path of self-destruction and is about to lose everything, including himself. But... will he come to terms with his illness? Will he have the strength to fight back?

454291.title: Stray
454291.description: A drifter with a sordid past manages to start a new life for herself in a small town, but her odd behavior starts to worry her newfound friends.

454631.title: Roulette
454631.description: A wheelchair-bound landscaper with a mysterious illness that no doctor can diagnose. A bitter alcoholic desk jockey who blames the world for an unhappiness he cannot define. An evangelical Christian who finds herself on a dark road toward sexual liberation. A loaded gun and a deadly game of chance that has united three strangers with nothing left to lose. This is ROULETTE: the eight-time award-winning psychological thriller from acclaimed Writer/Director Erik Kristopher Myers. Three powerful stories, told in fragments, rhythmically and structurally interwoven with the game of Russian Roulette that has brought Dean (Mike Baldwin), Kessler (Will Haza, Best Actor, 2011 World Music & Independent Film Festival), and Sunny (Ali Lukowski, Best Actress, 2012 Hot Media International Film Festival) together. Who are these people, really? What faces are they hiding behind masks, not only from the world around them, but from us, the viewer? How did they come to be here for this final shock treatment that ends with a literal 'Bang'...? Smash or Trash Indie Film Making calls ROULETTE "incredible...unforgettable...an excellent, well-crafted film"; The Examiner dubs it "a tremendous success"; and CaptainHowdy.com declares it a "masterpiece" that "wears the crown in terms of real-world, psychological horror." Witness the film that has critics and audiences in awe of an ending so shocking and controversial that few films can compare. Come play ROULETTE.

455862.title: Behind the Mirror
455862.description: When a writer moves his family to upstate New York, he clashes with locals and meets a devious shaman who brings out his shadow self and inner demons.

462751.title: Serialized
462751.description: After getting dropped by her publisher, celebrated novelist Hannah Ryan uses the negative forces in her life to inspire the creation of a pulp crime serial that posts new chapters to subscriber's devices every week. The initial release is a modest success but the work becomes a massive hit after a real life murder takes place that bears a striking similarity to Hannah's story. Is it really just a coincidence or is it possible that a copycat serial killer is acting out the fictitious murders in real life? And is he going to strike again once Hannah releases her next chapter?

462761.title: First Response
462761.description: A gunman forces a paramedic to drive an ambulance, while his partner treats the man's injured brother.

462771.title: Trigger Point
462771.description: Callie finds herself affected by big business politics and decides to join an activist group to do something about it.

466372.title: True Crime: Venus and Mars
466372.description: A community is shaken by fear when a police officer is left bound and bleeding in the backyard of his burning house. The case soon gets stranger.

467313.title: Shadows on the Road
467313.description: After a violent quarrel, a teen runaway bolts for the Mexican border with a charming beach bum, but the past she is fleeing continues to pursue her.

468581.title: The President's Mistress
468581.description: When the U.S. president's mistress is murdered, her brother investigates, uncovering a dark link to the KGB and concerns about his own leaders.

468864.title: The Freedom of Silence
468864.description: In the year 2030, America has become a twisted version of freedom. Truth is silenced, and believing in God is considered a terrorist act.

470439.title: Angry Kelly
470439.description: A woman in crisis attempts to flee the terror of everyday life by writing in a blog. Her suicidal reflections will soon become infamous.

470697.title: Past Sins
470697.description: Donna, a high-profile criminal defense attorney, must determine if her client is a murderer or the sole survivor of a lethal conspiracy.

472703.description: A simple plan for a difficult job goes horribly wrong as a tight crew of four thieves decide to take down a boutique hotel in the dead of winter.

475853.title: Blind Injustice
475853.description: After a blind woman is victimized in a brutal attack, she has the confidence that she can identify her assailant in the pursuit of justice.

477511.title: The Imagemaker
477511.description: A jaded media advisor to countless politicians decides to make a tell-all movie based on what he knows of their unscrupulous media shenanigans.

480212.title: Danika
480212.description: A wife and mother of three lives a wonderful life, until her everyday worries begin to grow and manifest themselves in gruesome, horrific reality.

484030.title: Final Cut
484030.description: The film opens with the cast gathering after the funeral of Jude to see a film he had been working on for two years. It turns out that the film is secret videos of all those gathered together in their most despicable moments including thievery, spousal abuse, adultery, etc. The revelations remove the masks from the so-called close friends.

486978.title: Donovan Reid
486978.description: A young man pretends to be a long-missing child but as doubts start to form about who he truly is, he has to find out his new family’s darkest secret.

491080.title: Silent Panic
491080.description: After three friends discover a dead body on a camping trip, they must decide what to do. Their next decision will change the course of their lives.

491745.title: The Tribe
491745.description: Three young sisters struggle to survive a pandemic that has ravaged their world until a stranger arrives and upends what they perceive to be reality.

492822.title: Sex Killer
492822.description: A seemingly normal Ontario bed and breakfast houses a perverse and twisted secret involving a sociopath, a masochist, and a pathological liar.

493018.title: The Spy Within
493018.description: An explosives expert fleeing his past and a beautiful spy trading sex for secrets find themselves in love and fighting the spy ring out to kill them.

495775.title: Pleasure Island
495775.description: A man returns home after his time in the army, and must aid a childhood friend who’s been pulled into a dangerous and intoxicating underworld.

497658.title: Hatchet Hour
497658.description: An ambitious lawyer, fearing legal and career ruin, brings in her best friend to help her hide the body of the gardener who she killed by mistake.

498302.title: Separate Lives
498302.description: Action-film icon Linda Hamilton stars in this sexy thriller about a woman who may not be who she says she is after hiring a bodyguard for safety.

499237.title: Disappearance
499237.description: After an author goes missing from his sailboat one night, a detective must interview his wife, girlfriend, and captain to find the truth.

499822.title: She Has a Name
499822.description: A lawyer fights global corruption that lets sex traffickers cross borders by posing as a john to free an enslaved prostitute and get her testimony.

500687.title: Streamer
500687.description: An isolated young man becomes obsessed with a webcam girl who lives in his building and befriends her, despite conflicted feelings.

501735.title: The Silent Fall
501735.description: After her colleague is murdered, a South African doctor researching a cost-effective AIDS drug is threatened by a powerful pharmaceutical giant.

504797.title: Blame
504797.description: A perfect storm of lies, loss, love, and betrayal forms after a group of attackers seeking revenge leave a man for dead in a home invasion gone wrong.

506052.title: A Daughter's Nightmare
506052.description: After her father dies, a young woman begins to suspect that the mysterious man her mother met in a support group might have sinister intentions.

506376.title: Videotape
506376.description: When a pregnant woman’s death is ruled a suicide, a freelance journalist is contacted by a witness with video footage that shows a different story.

508278.title: Seeing Heaven
508278.description: An appealing young man searching for his lost twin brother finds his life falling apart from his work as an escort and his complex, trippy dreams.

508337.title: Identidad Equivocada (Doblado)
508337.description: La policía confunde a una mujer que se refugia en el apartamento de su novio desaparecido con una mujer fatal que huye de delincuentes.

520236.title: Remember Me
520236.description: Still grieving her son’s death two years earlier, Menly’s life with her husband and new baby is rocked when unexplained events happen in their home.

526192.title: Sueños Mortales (Doblado)
526192.description: Una mesera tiene visiones psíquicas sobre asesinatos que están por ocurrir, por lo que un detective la contrata para atrapar a un asesino en serie.

526499.title: Outlier
526499.description: After being sent to live with his police officer sister in her sleepy small town, a teen boy witnesses a double murder that no one believes happened.

535770.title: Driven Underground
535770.description: A single mother with a gun stops at nothing to protect her daughter, a key witness in a mob murder case, after relocating the entire family to Oregon.

545192.title: Wallflower
545192.description: Set in Seattle, this is the story of a man considering executing a mass shooting, who finds himself surrounded by eccentric new friends.

545588.title: Little Terrors
545588.description: A man harboring a young boy recruited by terrorists plays a dangerous game when he attempts to convince the boy not to go through with a bombing.

545921.title: American Violence
545921.description: Psychologist Dr. Amanda Tyler evaluates death row inmate Jack Shea. Now, she must decide if his stay of execution should be granted.

547110.title: Joyride
547110.description: After three aimless teenagers steal a car, they spark the anger of a deadly female assassin. Now they're in for the ride of their lives.

547373.title: Dinero Por Su Silencio (Doblado)
547373.description: Los planes de un maestro se desmoronan cuando secuestra a la hija de un jugador de pelota para pagar una deuda a un despiadado jefe de la mafia.

553250.title: A Wolf at the Door
553250.description: A journey to the dark edge of desires, lies and wickedness of a love triangle, from the moment a child is mysteriously kidnapped.

555070.title: Murder RX
555070.description: A single mother and her troubled teenage daughter look for a fresh start in a small town and get entangled in an illegal prescription drug ring.

557821.title: The Fox
557821.description: Haunted by his accidental killing of a child, a former Irish police sergeant-turned-Europol agent is sent to the Netherlands to investigate a murder.

558560.title: Claire Is Dead
558560.description: A high school football hero’s perfect life unravels, as he gradually becomes obsessed with solving the mystery surrounding a classmate's death.

559176.title: Despair
559176.description: After a couple rescues a woman from freezing in the middle of the Scottish mountains, they soon realize that the woman is not who she says she is.

559453.title: Naturaleza Desatada: Terremoto (Doblado)
559453.description: La familia de un ingeniero está en el camino directo al peligro después de que un temblor masivo dañara severamente una planta nuclear rusa.

562764.title: Hacker
562764.description: A recent immigrant to Canada joins a dark web hacking scheme that steals and launders their spoils, but when his mother hits hard times he goes rogue.

562805.title: Secrets of Deception
562805.description: Hell hath no fury like a man scorned when a husband’s violent meltdown ensues once he learns his wife is having an affair with a local younger man.

565893.title: Appetite
565893.description: Hotel guests play a high stakes game of cards, where the loser must sleep in a haunted room. Secrets are revealed and darkness ensues.

566444.title: Trafficked
566444.description: Based on real people, this is the story of three young women who risk everything to escape an elaborate human trafficking network.

569652.title: Jordan
569652.description: A five-year-old found wandering in shock from a car crash is reunited with her mother by a Sheriff, but she claims the woman isn't her mother at all.

573116.title: Negro Buenos Aires
573116.description: Un empresario catalán deja sus escrúpulos a un lado y aprovecha la peor crísis económica de Argentina para hacer negocios con las cúpulas del poder.

574491.title: Beyond Suspicion
574491.description: Behind Valérie’s estimable front as a psychiatrist, mom, and wife of a parishioner is a chilling secret life as a serial killer of domestic abusers.

576981.title: Gozo
576981.description: The picture-perfect new life a British couple has created on a tiny island in the Mediterranean Sea falls apart once a young tourist goes missing.

579379.title: Super Dark Times
579379.description: Two teen boys and best friends see their calm suburban world implode after the accidental death of a classmate leads to another death they can’t hide.

582787.title: Abduction of Angie
582787.description: A paramedic faces a life-and-death emergency of her own, when her estranged father, who has a violent past, kidnaps her eight-year-old daughter.

583987.title: Killed My Wife
583987.description: A man’s drunken blackout ends with him learning his wife is dead. Accused of her murder, he has to retrace disturbing events that may reveal clues.

590069.title: The Box
590069.description: Life and reality start to blur in a terrifying way for an actor who has recurring nightmares of being in a house of mirrors he can’t break through.

594788.title: Premoniciones
594788.description: Brenda está maldecida por su don de predecir. Un poder que cada vez se sale más de su control. Ahora ha perdido a su madre, conviertiéndola en la principal sospechosa.

594953.title: Moving Target
594953.description: A rebellious 16 yr. old's search for his missing family after they have been relocated by the FBI under the witness protection program.

597657.title: Notorious
597657.description: A woman is asked to spy on a group of Nazi friends in South America. How far will she have to go to ingratiate herself with them?

598465.title: Nowheresville
598465.description: In an isolated motel somewhere south of Memphis, FBI bookkeeper Simon takes on his first assignment as a field agent: surveillance on the notorious thief Michael and his moll Samantha. However, after weeks of spying on the lovebirds, Simon finds himself falling for the dame. When a chance meeting sparks a torrid affair, she convinces the honest lawman to plot the untimely murder of her criminal mate. But questions soon loom in Simon's mind: how long before she takes another lover and how long before they plot his own murder?

599285.title: The Dirty Kind
599285.description: A terrifying look at how it all goes wrong for a politician, two gangsters, a hooker and a private investigator who gets mixed up in it all.

603068.title: Hold
603068.description: Following a violent home invasion, a young couple find that their relationship is more fragile than ever, as tension continues to build.

610489.title: Payback
610489.description: When a wealthy teenager becomes the victim of a brutal assault, he is sent on vacation to recover, where he meets another boy, and a killer emerges.

616485.title: Princess in the Castle
616485.description: Dark psychological drama. An early social media influencer comes back into the public eye with a harrowing tale of captivity and mental torture. The enigmatic Connie Castille has a story to die for...

617580.title: Thy Neighbor
617580.description: A pastor of a small-town church attempts to reach out to his mysterious neighbor, but realizes that his outreach is putting his own family in danger.

617600.title: Open Marriage
617600.description: A couple rediscovers passion with an open marriage, until a stranger gets involved, creating a dangerous path to betrayal, heartbreak, and bloodshed.

618298.title: Vecino Siniestro (Doblado)
618298.description: Su vecino valora tanto su amistad, que pasa por alto que atropelló accidentalmente a una mujer y se dio a la fuga dándola por muerta.

621982.title: Mirage
621982.description: A photographer who’s slowly going blind hatches a plan with a man to murder his dying wife in order to inherit her substantial life insurance policy.

622463.title: Don't Show Mother
622463.description: An agoraphobic mother and her son, trying to live a normal live after years of shocking abuse, are unable to come to terms with their shared trauma.

622503.title: Wrong Night Stand
622503.description: A drunken night out with friends leads to a romantic hook-up for a man and woman — but when her ex comes back later, things get incredibly deadly.

624117.title: Road to Nowhere
624117.description: Art and reality intersect as a driven filmmaker making a true-crime film casts an unknown actress who is a look-alike of the case’s femme fatale.

629447.title: The American Side
629447.description: A low-level detective finds a conspiracy to erect a stunning invention by Nikola Tesla after his partner dies and a suicide occurs at Niagara Falls.

631192.title: Exit Plan
631192.description: A troubled insurance agent trying to find the truth of a married man’s disappearance comes across a hotel that offers suicide as one of its services.

631940.title: The Dunes
631940.description: A domestic counselor is enraged to the point of no return when his ex-wife says she wants to move cross-country with their son and her new boyfriend.

632159.title: Lone Wolf
632159.description: In a near-future Melbourne ruled by corruption and constant surveillance, a group of small-time activists hatches a plan to disrupt the G20 summit.

632846.title: Still
632846.description: An atmospheric thriller about a lost female hiker taken in by a strange young couple harboring a simmering secret on their farm deep in the woods.

633785.title: Secrets in the Water
633785.description: Inspired by true events, a grieving mother enlists the help of her murdered daughter’s friend to track down suspects that lead to her inner circle.

635480.title: In Broad Daylight
635480.description: When Malik learns his cousin has been kidnapped and is being held hostage by her obsessive ex-boyfriend, he becomes a one-man search army to find her.

637588.title: Playback
637588.description: A detective investigating his daughter’s death is tormented by a closet full of VHS tapes, each showing his daughter having sex with other men.

667759.title: Bad Influence
667759.description: Joan is overjoyed when her bright but shy daughter makes a new friend at school. But Joan’s delight turns to horror as the girl begins to exert a dark influence over her daughter.

672622.title: Obsessed to Death
672622.description: When Cassie’s boyfriend leaves her for a spin instructor, Cassie becomes obsessed with her and ultimately wants revenge, but not before the new girlfriend discovers her murderous ways.

673406.title: A Violent Man
673406.description: The life of a violent and institutionalized prisoner is disrupted when his estranged daughter requests to meet him and a 19-year-old serving his first sentence becomes his new cellmate.

674424.title: The Stepmother
674424.description: After a recently widowed single father moves to a new town, a new mysterious woman threatens his relationship with his son and their safety.

683751.title: Riding With Sugar
683751.description: A refugee escapes violence, only to discover that kindness can conceal an even more dangerous threat.

690106.title: Rush for Your Life
690106.description: A journalism student goes undercover as a sorority pledge to expose those responsible for the death of a student the previous year.

691220.title: Alone in the Dark
691220.description: A recent divorcée under house arrest must deal with a stalker that appears to have control over her surroundings.

693543.title: The Ex Obsession
693543.description: When Kim and her husband John accidentally kill Kim’s ex George, Kim directs John to impersonate George in a desperate cover-up that spirals into obsession.

694192.title: A Party to Die For
694192.description: After a party turns deadly, an aspiring socialite and her friend must find a way to get rid of a body and avoid the consequences of their actions.

698978.title: The Manny
698978.description: When a single mom hires a handsome and qualified male nanny, she can’t believe her luck. But the manny is hiding dangerous secrets and will do whatever it takes to hold on to his new family.

705436.title: Prisoner of Love
705436.description: Inspired by a true story. A corrections officer falls in love with an inmate and helps plot his escape, leaving her hometown to question her choices.

705978.title: Primal
705978.description: When their van breaks down, four sex workers find themselves stranded at a backwoods gas station and soon realize they’ve fallen into a deadly trap.

707088.title: Good Wife's Guide to Murder
707088.description: When an expert in spousal murder is accused of killing her husband, she must use her investigation skills to prove her innocence.

707381.title: Girls Getaway Gone Wrong 2
707381.description: When three best friends reunite for a girls’ trip to Fashion Week, they become the prime suspects when a designer goes missing.

708852.title: On the Edge
708852.description: A rich, progressive couple decides to rescue a young prostitute and offers her shelter in their countryside house—but their true colors quickly show.

710225.title: The Assistant
710225.description: Raven hires a new personal assistant, thinking she's found the perfect fit. But fear sets in when personal organization turns to personal obsession.

711155.title: Shut In
711155.description: A widowed child psychologist living a rural, isolated existence becomes convinced the ghost of a missing boy is haunting her and her bedridden son.

722270.title: Deadly Estate
722270.description: When a hotel manager is wrongly accused of killing the soon-to-be new owner’s son, she must use her hospitality skills to prove her innocence.

722979.title: Best Friend
722979.description: Trisha and Jamie have been best friends since grade school. Jamie tries to keep Trisha’s new love interest apart, even if it costs someone’s life.

100000301.title: Castaways
100000301.description: In a post apocalyptic world, two women find themselves shipwrecked on a deserted island. As they fight to survive, the experience bonds them in ways they could never have imagined.

100000371.title: The Threat Next Door
100000371.description: When an overworked single mother hires a friendly neighbor to babysit her daughter, she begins to face increasingly strange and threatening situations.

100000719.title: Surprise
100000719.description: Convinced his wife is cheating on him with his best friend, a husband goes off the deep end into a conspiracy, only to find himself unprepared for what comes next.

100000963.title: Blood, Sweat and Cheer
100000963.description: A mother seeking to relive her glory days poses as her teen daughter to join a high school dance team.

100000965.title: A Good Man
100000965.description: Struggling in the aftermath of his wife's affair, a man's attempt at a new relationship begins to spiral out of control when he notices familiar signs.

100001214.title: Murder at the Murder Mystery Party
100001214.description: An aspiring actress thinks a murder mystery party will be the perfect way to break into the LA scene — until she realizes that the murder is real, and she’s being framed for it.

100001401.title: No Way Out
100001401.description: Forced to take on a double murder case after the suspect threatens his family, attorney Brian Nelson begins to unravel the facts and learns the case isn’t what it seems.
